title: Use conservation of momentum
text: Derive an equation from $$p_{initial}$$ $$=$$ $$p_{final}$$ with $$p=m_1 v_1$$ + $$m_2 v_2$$. Simply if needed.

title: Use conservation of energy
text: Derive an equation from $$KE_{initial}$$ $$=$$ $$KE_{final}$$ with $$KE=\frac{1}{2} m v^2$$. Simply if needed.

title: Derive for the relative final velocity
text: Derive an expression $$v_{1,final}$$ - $$v_{2,final}$$ in terms of $$v_{1,initial}$$ and $$v_{2,initial}$$.
